idea:
Globalcal Private Limited is a company focused in developing innovative technology targeting community specific digital solutions.


Our Company headquarter is based in Mumbai and we plan to scale up our product manufacturing unit in Morbi city of Gujarat state of India.


We have a strong team of subject matter scholars, technical experts from various technology sectors to back the innovating challenging ideas into reality.


We identified that there is a need of digitalizing Indian Calendar System which is not presently available across anywhere globally.


Currently we are have innovated Indian Digital Calendar System, which address all major religious communities of India and will be available in major Indian Languages.
name: GLOBALCAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At PositivEnergy Consulting (PEC), we believe that a company is only as good as its strategy and the strategy is only as good as the people who define and execute it.

PEC is a consulting and coaching start-up which offers services which include - strategy audits, fractional CSO services, strategic planning, strategic initiatives, strategic sales & business development, and executive leadership coaching.

1. With our strategy consulting offerings, we help our clients identify gaps, risks, and opportunities in existing strategy, help them (re)plan their long-term vision and agenda, and support them in the execution of their strategic roadmap.

2. With our executive leadership coaching practice, we empower people to achieve balance and align with their professional, personal, and emotional goals.

3. With our strategic sales & business development services, among other things, we help our clients grow and gain by introducing international companies and their products to the Indian market and take Indian companies and their products to markets abroad.
name: PositivEnergy Consulting Private Limited
